quadrants.title: Languages & Frameworks
quadrants.description: A selection of programming languages, alongside essential frameworks for building a variety of custom software.

quadrants.title: Data Management
quadrants.description: Technologies and tools for managing and storing data, including databases, data processing, and data analysis.

quadrants.title: Datastores
quadrants.description: A range of data storage solutions, including databases, caches, and other data storage technologies.

quadrants.title: Tools
quadrants.description: A range of software tools, from simple productivity enhancers to comprehensive project solutions, catering to various project needs.

ossProjects.name: Tracify PHP SDK
ossProjects.description: A PHP SDK for Tracify, enabling server-side event tracking.

ossProjects.name: Tiktok PHP SDK
ossProjects.description: A PHP SDK for TikTok's API, supporting user and video management.

ossProjects.name: Raynet PHP SDK
ossProjects.description: A PHP SDK for Raynet CRM, supporting contact and deal management.

ossProjects.name: DHL Express PHP SDK
ossProjects.description: A PHP SDK for DHL Express, supporting shipment tracking and label generation.

ossProjects.name: SAP Material Document
ossProjects.description: An OpenAPI PHP client for managing SAP material documents, including creation, retrieval, and cancellation.

ossProjects.name: SAP Purchase Order
ossProjects.description: A PHP API client for SAP purchase orders, supporting CRUD operations and advanced integrations.

ossProjects.name: Exponea API SDK
ossProjects.description: A PHP SDK for integrating with the Exponea (Bloomreach) engagement platform, supporting event tracking and customer interactions.

ossProjects.name: Helios Auth API Client
ossProjects.description: Authentication API client generated with OpenAPI, supporting PHP 7.4+.

ossProjects.name: Fedex PHP SDK
ossProjects.description: FedEx REST API integration for PHP, supporting operations like token generation, tracking information, and address validation.

ossProjects.name: SmartEmailing API
ossProjects.description: Nette component for working with SmartEmailing API, providing functionality for managing contacts and orders.

labels.title: Technology Radar
labels.footer: Technology radar based on the open source repository by AOE
labels.notUpdated: This item was not updated in last three versions of the Radar. Should it have appeared in one of the more recent editions, there is a good chance it remains pertinent. However, if the item dates back further, its relevance may have diminished and our current evaluation could vary. Regrettably, our capacity to consistently revisit items from past Radar editions is limited.
